### Wannierization

:::{.columns}

:::{.column width=40%}

- Unitary transformation of Bloc
h functions
- Localized in space
- Translation images of each other
- Forms orthonormal set
$$w_{n,k}(r) = \frac{1}{\sqrt N} \sum_N e^{-ik.R} \psi_k(r)$$

<div style="color:FireBrick; text-align:center">

Scales linearly with system's size

</div>

:::


:::{.column width=60%}

![](_figs/WFs.png){width=100%}

:::

### Tight Binding
:::{.columns}

:::{.column width=65%}
- Model to analyze energy bands in a crystal
- Complete wavefunction can be written as the sum of wannier functions
- Corresponds to LCAO method
- Electron under the influence of other atoms are treat as perturbation

$$\hat{H} = \hat{H_m} + V_{\phi_{1}} + V_{\phi_{1}}$$

Energy eigen value is computed as the expectation value:


$$
\begin{bmatrix}
\langle \phi_1|\hat{H}|\phi_1 \rangle   &    \langle \phi_1|\hat{H}|\phi_2 \rangle\\
\langle \phi_2|\hat{H}|\phi_1 \rangle   &    \langle \phi_2|\hat{H}|\phi_2 \rangle
\end{bmatrix} 
=
\begin{bmatrix}
E_{11}   &   t_{12}\\
t_{21}   &    E_{22}
\end{bmatrix}
$$
:::
